messages.title: Immigration
messages.content: Mass Immigration is the biggest issue on the doorstep and the problem is getting worse. UKIP is the only party that wants to leave the EU with a clear policy to control immigration. Many old Labour supporters didn't realise that Labour wants more immigrants to enter Britain and that they introduced the Open Door Immigration Policy when they were last in power. UKIP, like most people, think this is wrong.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mass Immigration is the biggest issue on the doorstep and the problem is getting worse. UKIP is the only party that wants to leave the EU with a clear policy to control immigration. UKIP, like most people, think this is wrong.

leaflet.personalStatement: Alan is your parliamentary candidate and is passionate about South Derbyshire. UKIP is now recognised as the only party that advocates Common Sense in politics. Alan, and UKIP, will be a strong independent voice for you.
